decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development, by reason of its size, position and appearance would not preserve or enhance the character of Grove Park Conservation Area, contrary to policy ENV-B.2.2 of the Council's Unitary Development Plan.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development, by reason of its location, would be contrary to the site specific policy ENV-N.1.8 (Duke's Meadows/Riverside Lands), and policy ENV-B.1.7 (Telecommunications) of the Council's Unitary Development Plan.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development, by reason of its lack of sharing facilities, would be contrary to the advice of Section 8 of the Council's U.D.P. Supplementary Guidance relating to Telecommunications.
description: Replacement of existing floodlights column with a similar column housing 6 antennas along with 4no remotely located ground based radio equipment cabinets and ancillary development.
